definition: colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
(of speech or actions) direct and efficient/without fooling around

sentences.english: I see pictures of small pistols, and I hope, quick and painless.
sentences.chinese: 我看到小手槍，而且我真希望，乾淨利落，豪無痛苦。

sentences.english: They think of themselves as point-blank, actually sometimes they are more long-winded than women.
sentences.chinese: 他以爲自己爽快利落，其實有時候比女人還要婆媽。

sentences.english: Lips well developed but not pendulous giving a clean finish.
sentences.chinese: 嘴脣發達但不下垂，末端乾淨利落。

sentences.english: The butcher 's knife cut cleanly through the meat.
sentences.chinese: 屠夫的刀利落地把肉切開。

sentences.english: Opened mouth wouldn't even monosyllabic name cleanly.
sentences.chinese: 張了張嘴連單音節也沒法利落地說出。

sentences.english: He has an incisive manner of speaking, happily free from umms and ers.
sentences.chinese: 他說話乾脆利落，完全沒有哼哼哈哈的腔調。

sentences.english: The shot is clean, and fatal, just behind the front leg.
sentences.chinese: 這一槍乾淨利落而且致命，打在了鹿的前腿後面。

sentences.english: Auto balanced scraper ensures even pressuer;
sentences.chinese: 自動平衡之油刀，刮油乾淨利落。

sentences.english: I struck the ball cleanly and my shot was on target.
sentences.chinese: 我乾脆利落地擊球，命中了目標。

sentences.english: It's better to choose powder snap and big brush when dressing, this can apply cosmetics rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 化妝時最好選用粉撲及大刷子，才能快速利落地上妝。

sentences.english: And yesterday she showed off her neatest dance steps at an exhibition in Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，在東京的展覽上她向人們展示了她利落的舞姿。

sentences.english: Thy edge should blunter be than appetite.
sentences.chinese: 說你的刀鋒還沒有食慾利落。

sentences.english: That clear-cut position, the water raised up after the very satisfying.
sentences.chinese: 那姿勢乾淨利落，水提上來以後非常滿足。

sentences.english: It has a crisp visual impact.
sentences.chinese: 它是一個乾脆利落的視覺衝擊。

definition: (of speech or actions) direct and efficient/without fooling around
see 乾脆利落|干脆利落[gan1 cui4 li4 luo5]
lit. wading in mud and water/a slovenly job/sloppy
